page.title: 08Leisure
page.content: Each week people can read comics or newspapers.People can either buy them or order them If you wanted to hear news about Templepatrick you could buy The Belfast Telegragh or The Antrim Guardian.The comic which I buy each week is the Beano.You can also buy: Topper,Beezer,Pepper Street,Twinkle,Mandy,Bunty,and lots more if you wanted to. If I wanted to go out and play I would just fool around in my back garden.On Thursday I go out to Gymnastics at the Antrim Forum because my hobby is Gymnastics.If you wanted a hobby you could swim,collect something,cycle,and lots more.
